details.arabic_diacless: حسبي اللٰه لا إلٰه إلا هو عليه توكلت وهو رب العرش العظيم
details.arabic: حَسْبِيَ اللّٰهُ لَا إِلٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ عَلَيْهِ تَوَكَّلْتُ وَهُوَ رَبُّ الْعَرْشِ الْعَظِيْمِ
details.transliteration: Hasbiyallaahu laa 'ilaaha 'illaa Huwa 'alayhi tawakkaltu wa Huwa Rabbul-'Arshil-'Adheem.
details.translations: Allaah is Sufficient for me, none has the right to be worshipped except Him, upon Him I rely and He is Lord of the exalted throne.
details.bottom: Allah will grant whoever recites this Seven times in the morning or evening whatever he desires from this world or the next
details.reference: Ibn As-Sunni (no. 71), Abu Dawud 4/321, Ibn As-Sunni. Quran 9:129

pageTitle: Grant whatever you desire from this life or the next
